chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control 9.2.4 Defined Approach Requirements: Access to consoles in sensitive areas is restricted via locking when not in use. Customized Approach Objective: Physical consoles within sensitive areas cannot be used by unauthorized personnel. Testing Procedures: Testing Procedure 9.2.4: Observe a system administrator’s attempt to log into consoles in sensitive areas and verify that they are “locked” to prevent unauthorized use. Guidance: Purpose: Locking console login screens prevents unauthorized persons from gaining access to sensitive information, altering system configurations, introducing vulnerabilities into the network, or destroying records.
requirement: Access to consoles in sensitive areas is restricted via locking when not in use.
